commit-message: add rudimentary POM that only builds the full velocity-tools jar so far git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/velocity/tools/trunk@485872 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

mark servlet api as provided scope (shame the servlet-api's pom can't just tell maven to use this as the default instead of the default default of 'compile') and update dependency graph to match veltools2 so that you can actually compile veltools1.4 with Maven git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/velocity/tools/trunk@595826 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

support use of VelocityView equally in servlets or filters and make it easier to use without access to either FilterConfig or ServletConfig git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/velocity/tools/trunk@647050 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68
